content.rendered:
Michaela joined Regent College Lodon in November 2018 as an experienced Admissions Officer in Higher Education. Firstly, she developed herself to a University Partnership Admissions Manager with recent progression to an Outreach Partner Manager to build and maintain relationships with our partners and ensure the targets are met.

Key responsibilities

  • Take responsibility for the acquisition and relationship management of our partners
  • Work closely with senior management and other team members to align our internal goals
  • Working as part of ARWA team to deliver great customer service to our students
  • Responsible for ongoing training requirements and implement improvements to existing processes and to manage conflicting priorities in workloads
  • Taking responsibility for processing undergraduate/postgraduate applications from Home and EU students and verify supporting documents
  • Managing UNIT-e launcher related tasks, queries, data management, and invigilating initial assessments
